Quotes.quote: The worst type of loneliness is the loneliness you feel when you are with people.
A toxic person only changes their victims, never themselves.
You can be the whole package at the wrong address.
Once you've accepted your flaws, no one can use them against you.
The hardest prison to escape is in your mind.
Speaking about your goals kills motivation.
When we're constantly wishing for something, we overlook what we already have.
The less you care about the opinions of others, the more powerful you become.
When you know what you want, have a plan to achieve it, and do the work consistently, nothing can stop you.
Watch how people treat service workers. It'll show you their true character.
Knowing what you want in life gets you far more than if you didn't.
The only way to get what you want is to ask for it.
Seeking out adversity will help us grow more than being in a comfort zone.
Investing in yourself isn't selfish. It is the most worthwhile thing you can do.
The power of focusing on one thing at a time will change your life.
The sooner you stop lying to yourself, the quicker you can be unstoppable.
Less friends = deeper relationships.
People who accept suffering achieve greatness. Those who avoid it go nowhere.
It's not what happens, it's how you react that matters.
The more you learn, the more you earn.
Your life can change tomorrow, if you make the choice to change it.
The more sacrifices you are willing to make, the more successful you will become.
You are what you say to yourself - change the words you use.
To be great at anything, you must be consistently good for long enough.
Never regret anything that made you smile.
We are like islands in the sea, separate on the surface but connected in the deep.
The scariest moment is always just before you start.
